questions.consciousness: Hi, I'm a rescue robot. I'm here to help you. Are you hurt?
questions.injuries: Can you describe the type of injuries you have?
questions.can_walk: Can you walk and come with me?
questions.people_in_surroundings: Are there other victims inside the building?
questions.immediate_danger: Do you see any danger nearby? Please answer with yes or no.
robot_action: Stay here and wait. Emergency responders know you're here and are on their way.
Come with me, I'll guide you to the exit for your safety.
